text: Louis Aliot (; born 4 September 1969) is a French politician, a lawyer by profession, and the vice president of the National Rally (previously named National Front) since 16 January 2011. Louis Aliot is the mayor of Perpignan since July 3, 2020. == Biography == Louis Aliot was born on 4 September 1969 in Toulouse.Bruno Labrousse, « Louis Aliot », "Les politiques ariégeois : 1789-2003", 2004, === Member of the National Assembly for Pyrénées- Orientales's 2nd constituency === For the legislative elections of 2017, Louis Aliot is a candidate in the second constituency of the Pyrénées-Orientales, which is considered to be more favourable than the first one.. At the end of the first round of the election, he came first ahead of the candidate of the Democratic Movement, Christine Espert, with 30.80% of the votes cast.. He was elected on 18 June, with 50.56% of the votes cast and 452 votes against Christine Espert.Résultats de la 2e circonscription des Pyrénées-Orientales , ouillade.eu, 18 June 2017 === Municipal elections of 2020 in Perpignan === On 15 March, his list topped the first round with 35.65 % of the vote, well ahead of the outgoing mayor, Jean-Marc Pujol (18.43 %). ==Political mandates== * Regional councillor of Languedoc-Roussillon: since 26 March 2010 * Regional councillor of Midi-Pyrénées: 15 March 1998 – 21 March 2010 (leader of the FN group 2004–2010) * Municipal councillor of Perpignan: 23 March 2008 – 21 June 2009 ==References== * This article is part of the wikipedia article in English Louis Aliot * This article is part of the wikipedia article in French Louis Aliot Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:French lawyers Category:Politicians from Toulouse Category:Perpignan Category:National Rally
